features.name: One-Click Checkout
features.description: Streamlined checkout process with saved payment methods and address for faster conversion

features.name: Real-time Notifications
features.description: Push notifications for order updates, promotions, and system alerts using websockets

features.name: Advanced Search Engine
features.description: Elasticsearch-powered search with filters, auto-complete, and relevance ranking

features.name: Security Compliance Dashboard
features.description: Comprehensive security monitoring and compliance reporting for audit requirements

features.name: Mobile App MVP
features.description: Native mobile application for iOS and Android with core shopping functionality

features.name: Pricing Optimization Engine
features.description: Dynamic pricing algorithm based on demand, competition, and inventory levels

features.name: Customer Support Chat
features.description: Live chat integration with support team and basic automation for common queries

features.name: Data Analytics Platform
features.description: Comprehensive analytics dashboard with user behavior tracking and business metrics

features.name: Subscription Management
features.description: Recurring billing and subscription lifecycle management for premium services

features.name: Performance Optimization
features.description: Database indexing, caching layer, and CDN integration to improve site speed

features.name: Third-party Integration Hub
features.description: Centralized integration platform for external services like payment processors and shipping

features.name: AI-Powered Recommendations
features.description: Machine learning recommendation engine for personalized product suggestions

features.name: Multi-language Support
features.description: Internationalization and localization for global market expansion

features.name: API Rate Limiting
features.description: Advanced rate limiting and throttling for API security and performance

features.name: Social Media Login
features.description: OAuth integration with Facebook, Google, and Twitter for easier signup
